phrases: It is all a blank after that.
It is all a blank after that?!
Why do not you cast away all that sadness,
Seeing you smile is what gives me strength.
It would be nice if I could meet someone like him for real.
For some reason, my heart is racing.
Hey, can I sit next to you?
I want to be near you...
Man, the last thing I remember was eating oranges.
It is all blank after that.
It is all blank after that.
What the heck do you mean,
You think you can get off just by saying that?!
Have you seen the notice board?
We are all in the same class again.
Me, my darling, Chiharu-chan and hers, and Otani-kun too.
We will be in the same class for all three years...
Right up until the end, we will still be called All Hanshin-Kyojin.
How are you going to make this up to me?
That is my line, you stunted dwarf!
Getting so upset right at the start of the new semester...
What the heck did I do?
I-I will go find Chiharu-chan and the others, okay?
You have been in a foul mood ever since that last Umibouzu concert.
It is 119 for an ambulance, right?
What kind of hallucination did you have?
Next you will turn up with a marriage certificate and tell me we got married!
I may not remember what happened,
Do not get carried away, okay?
Did he really pass out right at that moment?
In any case, if he does not remember, then it really was just an accident.
Did something happen when you went to Otani-kun's place?
I am nothing more than an unattractive girl, after all.
What the heck do you want?
I would just ask you to kindly move aside.
I should be the one saying that.
It is such a waste to spoil such a cute face with a furrowed brow.
What is this cold feeling I seem to remember?
A guy that cool really exists!
What is so good about that guy?!
He is tall, cool, and charming like a prince!
That is the complete opposite of Otani-kun.
That idiot who breaks a girl's heart is not really my type at all.
I wonder what class he is in...
I need to maintain my cute face.
Koizumi is fantasizing about some imaginary lover.
And he is a foreigner to boot.
So she cannot get over it, huh...
We have got the gorilla again?
I am tired of seeing him already.
Since it is a pain, let us get some of this out of the way.
The class reps will be Otani and Koizumi.
Before that, there is something important I forgot.
We have a new teacher who will be our assistant homeroom teacher.
Here I thought you would forgotten me.
That person does not actually exist.
You are that girl from before.
He just looks like a character from a game.
I am your new assistant homeroom and English teacher.
I just moved here from Tokyo, so I am not familiar with Osaka at all.
If it is not too much trouble, please show me around.
Is it all right if we decide class reps now?
Then the other one will be...
This shorty here says he volunteers too.
We call those two All Hanshin-Kyojin.
Do not tell me you are giving up on Otani-kun, and going after Maity?
An oasis for my withered heart in this harsh reality.
It would be simpler if I did like him, though.
If it was a game, I could reset after failing.
Even if you say that casually,
And that face is not cute at all.
How long is Otani going to string me along?
Even now, I cannot see a single ray of hope.
How long will that idiot waste my precious youth away?
Why do I have to be a class rep too?
What are you doing mixing up real people with game characters?
Were not you talking about it this morning?
It is fine if you do not remember.
Did something happen when you came over?
You left right after the Umibouzu concert, right?
I waited in line to buy souvenirs, and I got something for you too.
It would have been a hassle if you came to me later saying you wanted one.
Are you really giving this to me?
It sure is easy to cheer you up, Koizumi.
If you do not want it, I will take it back.
His shirt is way too open...
His hair is too long in the front...
So, who is going to translate this next part?
He is off in dreamland, huh?
But I would prefer it if you gave me your attention while we are in class.
I am going to sleep too!
I am going to sleep too.
Nakano-sensei wanted me to give you a message.
Could you organize the roster for cleaning duty?
Otani, the coach is taking the day off.
Can you start on it by yourself?
I need to set the training menu today.
Maity is so cool and all...
Otani left all his work to me and ran off to play with his club.
If the coach is not around, should not they just take the day off?
When last year's seniors graduated, Otani became captain.
He did say he might make it, but I did not think he would actually...
This was decided a half a year ago.
Ever since then, he is been working really hard.
Is it all right for you not to do the class rep work?
I will be in the classroom, so tell Otani to come later.
Oh, and so we do not get in your way, the rest of us will leave early.
There are way too many reasons.
I do not even know, myself.
In the end, I still prefer Otani, after all.
Thanks for all your hard work.
When you are playing basketball, you are like a completely different person.
Is it because I am so cool when I play basketball?
Do not tell me you are not going to help?
It is your fault I am class rep, in the first place.
But if no one had volunteered, I would have felt bad for Maity-sensei.
Did you remember Maity-sensei's gentle whisper?
Do you seriously like that guy?
Do not go for a cold guy like that.
He probably just said it without thinking.
When I was sick and you came to visit me...
I was staring at your face like this...
There was a grain of rice stuck to it.
So then I was thinking I would take the rice off while making a joke, when I suddenly got dizzy...
I do not remember anything after that.
But you are angry about what happened after that, right?
After or before, above or below, left or right...
Of course there would be rice.
Rice is a staple in my diet.
Then why are you so angry?
Because you were sick and did not come to school,
Even though the two of us are alone in this room right now, I do not feel a thing.
Now that I think about it, I was so embarrassed I could have died.
You did not take the rice.
What you took was my lips.
What are you talking about now?
I guess that really was just an accidental bump, huh?
I have been trying so hard...
Even though you rejected me, I have been trying my best.
But if I go on liking you like this, nothing will change.
I have had enough of this.
I am through with loving you!
Even if I like him, nothing will change...
If there is no point at all...
What do you mean, Maity for Life?
You stole a kiss from me, too...
Next: A Dangerous Man - Maity's Sweet Seduction.
A Dangerous Man - Maity's Sweet Seduction
